full_summary:
### Runway Snow Blower Repair and Overhaul

**Notice Number:** W8486-249244/A
**Published Date:** 2024-02-07
**Closing Date:** 2024-03-21T14:00:00
**Status:** Expired

**Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requests proposals from reliable and experienced contractors for the repair and overhaul (R&O) of runway snow blowers. This project involves a three-year period with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful contractor will be responsible for:

- Inspection and testing of the runway snow blowers
- Repairs, training, and technical investigation as required
- Maintenance and repair will be conducted on an as-and-when-required basis, as detailed in a Task Authorization Form (DND 626 form)

**Submission of Bids:**
Bids must be submitted electronically to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. For details on electronic submission, please refer to the solicitation document.

**Debriefings:**
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Requests must be made within 15 working days from receipt of the results. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

**Contracting Details:**
* Project duration: 3 years with options for 2 additional 1-year periods
* Tender type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Evaluation criteria: Lowest Price
* Language of communication: English and French

**Attachments:**
Refer to the following attachments for further information:

* Annex A: Statement of Work (SOW)
* Annex B: Logistical SOW
* Annex C: Pricing information
* Annex D: Task Authorization Form (DND 626 form)
* Annex E: Technical evaluation criteria
* Annex F: Aggregate evaluated price of the bid
* Annex G: Electronic Payment Instruments
* Annex H: FCP
* Annex I: CF1280
* Annex J: Confidentiality agreement
* Solicitation document (RFP)
* Response to technical evaluation (price)

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or clarification, please contact:
